meanings.sent1: She rerecords her favorite song to improve the sound quality.
meanings.sent2: He always rerecords his lectures to ensure students can understand them clearly.
meanings.sent3: The parrot rerecords the phrase 'Polly wants a cracker' in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: The artist rerecords the melody of nature in his latest composition.
meanings.sent5: The historian rerecords the events of the past with meticulous detail.

meanings.definition: To make a new recording of something
meanings.sent1: The singer rerecords her album to add a new song.
meanings.sent2: They rerecord the podcast episode to fix a technical issue.
meanings.sent3: The robot rerecords the instructions in a robotic voice for fun.
meanings.sent4: The writer rerecords the memories of her childhood in a memoir.
meanings.sent5: The scientist rerecords the experiment to ensure accurate data collection.
